meanings.sent1: The basement had the fustiest odor after the flood.
meanings.sent2: The abandoned house had the fustiest smell of mildew and decay.
meanings.sent3: Grandma's attic was so fustiest that even the spiders wore tiny raincoats!
meanings.sent4: The fustiest smell in the old library was like a ghost from the past haunting the shelves.
meanings.sent5: The fustiest scent of the antique shop lingered in my mind long after I left.

meanings.definition: Old-fashioned or outdated in style or appearance.
meanings.sent1: Her fustiest dress belonged in a museum, not a fashion show.
meanings.sent2: The fustiest furniture in the room clashed with the modern decor.
meanings.sent3: Wearing a fustiest hat, he looked like a time traveler lost in the present.
meanings.sent4: The fustiest trends of the past resurfaced in a new light on the runway.
meanings.sent5: The fustiest painting in the gallery seemed to whisper stories of bygone eras.
